name: Ricetta: tempura ai fiori di sakura
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Sakura Tempura.

value.name: Gamberetti
value.desc: A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.

value.name: Melonlavanda
value.desc: Un frutto dal colore vivace. Se cucinata, la sua polpa si trasforma in pietanze dal sapore unico per il palato.

value.name: Fiore di sakura
value.desc: Fiori del Sakura sacro nel Gran Santuario di Narukami, impregnati della devozione per Inazuma.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: Una polvere ottenuta macinando il frumento. In qualunque modo venga utilizzata, soddisfa il palato di ogni commensale.

value.name: Tempura ai fiori di sakura
value.desc: A dish deep-fried in oil. Incorporate the marinated sakura blossom petals into the batter before giving the fresh shrimp and vegetables an even coating, frying, and then draining the oil. This all sounds simple enough, but good tempura making is not something achieved in a mere day.

value.name: Kamisato Ayato
value.desc: Il giovane ma particolarmente abile capo del clan Kamisato della Commissione Yashiro. Un uomo dalle mille risorse, colto e garbato.

value.name: Calma eleganza
value.desc: Kamisato Ayato's specialty. The arrangement is exquisite and elegant, much like the manner in which Ayato handles all his affairs. Any more, and it would have been excessive. Any less, and it would have proved a sight squandered. As you sample the dish, you find that its flavor is identical to that of Uyuu Restaurant's â€” amazing. But as you reach your chopsticks for that crystalline camellia, Ayato stops you... "That was something I made during sword practice. It's just a decoration."

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from the World Quest "Gourmet Supremos, Assemble!"</color>
